remarks: Value of the zero functional at any vector.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lcd0vval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcd0vval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0vval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcd0vval.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcd0vval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) $.
lcd0vval.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd0vval.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` C ) $.
lcd0vval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcd0vval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lcd0vvalN $p |- ( ph -> ( O ` X ) = .0. ) $.
